SEARCH
Package gw.api.rest

Class Response.ResponseBuilder

java.lang.Object
gw.api.rest.Response.ResponseBuilder
Enclosing class:
Response
public static class Response.ResponseBuilder extends Object
This class is a builder for Response, its build method will return a Response

    • entity

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this ResponseBuilder object, so that method calls can be chained

    • header

      public Response.ResponseBuilder header(String name, Object value)
      This add a value to the http headers to the build response. If the value is null the header will be removed. The header can have more than one value, this will add the value to list.

      To replace the header, you should call header with null value, and then header with correct value. Example: r.header("gw-locale", null).header("gw-locale", LocaleUtil.getCurrentLocale())

      Parameters:
      name - the http header name
      value - the value
      Returns:
      this ResponseBuilder object, so that method calls can be chained

    • addHeaderIfValueNotAlreadyPresent

      public Response.ResponseBuilder addHeaderIfValueNotAlreadyPresent(String name, Object value)

    • withNoCacheHeadersIfNotAlreadySet

      public Response.ResponseBuilder withNoCacheHeadersIfNotAlreadySet()
      This method will add the standard no cache headers, if no cache headers have been previously defined.
      Returns:
      this ResponseBuilder object, so that method calls can be chained

    • withNoCacheHeaders

      public Response.ResponseBuilder withNoCacheHeaders()
      This method will override the cache headers and add the standard no cache headers.
      Returns:
      this ResponseBuilder object, so that method calls can be chained

    • visit

      public Response.ResponseBuilder visit(Consumer<Response.ResponseBuilder> block)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this ResponseBuilder object, so that method calls can be chained

      Returns:
      this ResponseBuilder object, so that method calls can be chained
